text: Anthony "Tony" Haygarth (4 February 1945 â€“ 10 March 2017) was an English television, movie and theatre actor. He was known for his roles in Chicken Run and Fakers. In 2008, he played Alfred Doolittle in the Old Vic's Production of Pygmalion. In November 2008 he joined the cast of Emmerdale as Mick Naylor. Haygarth died from Alzheimer's disease on 10 March 2017 in Royal Tunbridge Wells, Kent, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Liverpool
title: Tony Haygarth
